content: I always fail at everything I try. Nothing ever works out for me. I'm completely useless.
Today's presentation went okay, but I stumbled on one slide so the whole thing was a disaster. Everyone must think I'm incompetent now.
I should be more productive. I must work harder. I need to be perfect at my job.
I feel like a failure, so I must be one. Because I feel anxious about this meeting, it means something bad will definitely happen.
My friend didn't text me back immediately. They must be angry at me. I've ruined our friendship.
This project is going to be a complete catastrophe. Everything that can go wrong will go wrong. It's going to be terrible and awful.
I got some positive feedback today, but they were just being nice. They don't really mean it. The criticism is what's true.
I made one mistake in the report, so I'm a terrible employee. I'm just a screw-up.
Every time I try something new, it never works out. This always happens to me. It's typical.
The weather is bad today. It must be because I had plans. Everything bad that happens is somehow my fault.
Today was a good day. I finished my work on time and went for a nice walk in the park. I'm grateful for the sunshine.
The meeting was challenging, but I handled it reasonably well. There's room for improvement, but overall I'm satisfied with how it went.
I didn't get the promotion this time. I'm disappointed, but I can use this as motivation to improve my skills for next time.
I feel anxious about tomorrow's interview. It's normal to feel nervous. I'll prepare as best I can and do my best.
My partner forgot our anniversary. They obviously don't care about me anymore. Our relationship is doomed.
I should have exercised today. I must stick to my schedule perfectly. If I miss one day, I'm a failure.
Everyone at the party was having fun except me. I'm so boring. No one wants to talk to me.
I tried really hard on this assignment but got a B+. I'm not smart enough. I'll never be good at this.
Today was tough. Work was stressful and I felt overwhelmed. But I got through it and I'm proud of that. Tomorrow is a new day.
I can't stand this situation. It's completely unbearable and intolerable. This is the worst thing that's ever happened.
